revision.comment: /* Track listing */ corrected title of track 7 on original release.
revision.text:
{{Infobox Album | | Name = Predator 2 original soundtrack | Type = Soundtrack | Artist = [[Alan Silvestri]] | Cover = Predator 2 -- soundtrack album cover.png | Released = December 13, 1990 (original release), December 1, 2014 (Deluxe Edition) | Recorded = | Genre = [[Soundtrack]] | Length = 45:14 (original release), 104:56 (Deluxe Edition) | Label = [[Varèse Sarabande]] VSD-5302 (original release), VCL-1151 (Deluxe Edition) | Chronology = ''Predator'' film series soundtrack | Last album = ''[[Predator (soundtrack)|Predator]]'' (1987) | This album = '''''Predator 2'''''
(1990) | Next album = ''[[Predators (soundtrack)|Predators]]'' (2010) }} {{Album ratings | rev1 = [[Allmusic]] | rev1Score = {{Rating|1.5|5}} {{Allmusic|class=album|id=r245831|pure_url=yes}} }} '''''Predator 2''''' is the official [[soundtrack album]] of the 1990 science fiction film ''[[Predator 2]]''. It was composed and conducted by [[Alan Silvestri]]. The score is completely [[orchestral]] and was released on December 13, 1990 via [[Varèse Sarabande]] label. ==Track listing== # "Main Title" – 2:46 # "First Carnage" – 2:34 # "Tunnel Chase" – 4:53 # "Truly Dead" – 4:58 # "Danny Gets It" – 3:18 # "Rest In Pieces" – 1:35 # "El Scorpio" – 2:42 # "This Is History" – 6:28 # "Swinging Rude Boys" – 2:40 # "Dem Bones" – 4:28 # "End Title" – 8:46 ===The Deluxe Edition=== Varese Sarabande issued a greatly expanded version on December 1, 2014. ''Disc 1'' # Welcome To The Jungle (2:52) # Chat (2:02) # Up On The Roof (3:27) # First Carnage (2:35) # Feds On The Case (:44) # Swinging Rude Boys (5:33) # Last Person/Danny Gets It (4:30) # Stay Out Of My Way (:31) # Mystery Dart (1:32) # Truly Dead (5:25) # Kid Commando (:34) # Rest In Pieces (1:36) # Subway Predator (5:22) # Tunnel Chase (5:17) # This Is History (7:11) ''Disc 2'' # Meat Locker (3:29) # Ugly Mother (3:40) # Birds (2:33) # The Doctor (3:44) # Elevator Shaft (1:45) # Dem Bones (4:29) # More Than One (2:34) # Came So Close/End Credits (9:08) # Hardcore Logo (1:26) # Danny Gets It (Extended Album Mix) (4:29) # Tunnel Chase (Extended Album Mix) (4:20) # This Is History (Extended Album Mix) (5:17) # Dem Bones (Album Mix) (6:40) # Wild Predator Voices (2:11) ==Credits== *Composed By, Conductor, Producer – [[Alan Silvestri]][http://www.discogs.com/Alan-Silvestri-Predator-2-Original-Motion-Picture-Soundtrack/release/1925094 Alan Silvestri: Predator 2 (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)] *Contractor [Orchestra] – Greg Sudmeier, Jeff Beal *Edited By [Assistant Music Editor] – Jacqueline Tager *Edited By [Music] – Ken Karman *Engineer [Assistant] – M.T. Silvia, Tony Eckert *Engineer [Consulting] – Bob Edwards *Executive Producer – Robert Townson *Orchestrated By – James B. Campbell *Other [Executive Assistant] – Tom Null *Performer – The Skywalker Symphony Orchestra *Producer [Assistant To] – David Bifano *Recorded By, Mixed By – Dennis Sands ℗ © 1990 Twentieth Century Fox ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Predator}} [[Category:Film soundtracks]] [[Category:1990 soundtracks]] [[Category:Varèse Sarabande soundtracks]]
